name: Rogue Hacker (itch)
description:
(Insert Name Here) is an inept programmer that works at a programming firm. Due to his ineptness, his only way to get a promotion is to beat up other programmers and steal their code. 

Beat up programmers, steal their code, avoid guards (they're reeeaaaaallllllyyyyy strong) and progress on through randomly generated offices. 

*UPDATE EXPECTED IN THE NEXT 2 WEEKS*

Current issues: Some freezes when guards are chasing
